desc: In today's business landscape, a growing number of small businesses are choosing cash discounting as their preferred method of payment acceptance. This approach enables them to make substantial savings on their monthly processing fees.
heading: Get ready to pay 0% on credit card processing fees!
banner: Process payments at no cost to your business
All fees are transferred to the customer
Fully compliant with regulations in all 50 states
Get a free credit card terminal at no charge
program_heading: The Ultimate Solution for Your Business Needs
program_desc: Joining our Cash Discount Program is quick and easy, so you can start saving right away. Once enrolled, you'll receive all the materials needed to inform your customers about the potential savings, helping you maximize your benefits.
program_items: We provide easy-to-understand signs for your business entrance and point-of-sale.
Our payment processing equipment comes with pre-installed software, making it easy for you to implement the Cash Discount Program.
We provide robust back-office reporting tools that allow you to easily monitor your transaction history and savings.
provide_business: We offer the following to benefit your business:
all_business_heading: Cash Discount Pricing for all types of business
footer_heading: Ready to implement a Cash Discount Program for your business?
faq_sub_heading: With BestPOS's Cash Discount Program, your business pays 0% for processing while offering customers an appealing discount.
